occupation: Business executive, co-founder of The Walt Disney Company
achievements: Co-founded The Walt Disney Company with his brother Walt
Instrumental in securing financing and business deals for Disney's projects
Oversaw the company's expansion and growth after Walt's death
Created iconic characters like Mickey Mouse
Led a successful campaign to oust Michael Eisner as CEO of The Walt Disney Company
Instrumental in the company's revival in the late 20th and early 21st centuries
